result.eng: It happened at the end of the last century.
result.ga: tharla sé ag deireadh an chéid seo caite
result.orig: tharla sé ag deireadh an chéid seo caite
result.html: tharla sé ag deireadh an chéid seo caiteIt happened at the end of the last century.
result.ponchtml: ṫarla sé ag deireaḋ an ċéid seo caiteIt happened at the end of the last century.

result.eng: We do not live in the the twentieth century any more!
result.ga: ní san fhichiú haois a mhaireann muid a thuilleadh
result.orig: ní san fhichiú haois a mhaireann muid a thuilleadh
result.html: ní san fhichiú haois a mhaireann muid a thuilleadhWe do not live in the the twentieth century any more!
result.ponchtml: ní san ḟiċiú haois a ṁaireann muid a ṫuilleaḋWe do not live in the the twentieth century any more!

result.eng: By the end of the 17th century slave ownership was ended in Europe.
